::Shadow Wing::

She saw Pernadot walking towards the Ark.  She swooped down from 
behind and reached with her talons to dig into his back. Then she 
rose up again into the sky.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Perndabot::
> 
> Perndabot nods. "Allright. Let's go," he says, starting to walk in 
the 
> direction of the Cybertronian Fire.
